short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Visual-Meta information based on BibTeX for easier citing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to add Visual-Meta automatically to PDF documents on download, initially from the ACM Digital Library, to support reading in Liquid | Reader and Copying As Citation.

http://www.liquid.info/reader.html
